## Description {#details}

### isUnordered() {#a5de9f33a91663caa0f07d6f873514b65}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::GMemOperation::isUnordered () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns true if this memory operation doesn&#39;t have any ordering constraints other than normal aliasing.

Volatile and (ordered) atomic memory operations can&#39;t be reordered.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/genericmachineinstrs-h/#l00067">67</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/genericmachineinstrs-h">GenericMachineInstrs.h</a>.
